author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 37-year-old woman was murdered by her brother here on Saturday.

Arumugam (37) of Jalakandapuram was married to Radha and the couple has a daughter Anitha (19). Anitha was married to Radha’s brother Murugan (30). Within a few months after marriage, Anitha went missing in April 2015. Murugan lodged a complaint with Mecheri police stating that his wife had eloped with Ganapathi. On March 22, the police traced the whereabouts of Anitha and Ganapathi and ordered them to come to the police station on Saturday.

On Saturday, Radha and Anitha were on their way to the police station on a two-wheeler, when Murugan intercepted them and attempted to stab Anitha. Radha intervened and sustained stab injuries.

She died on the way to hospital.

Mecheri police registered a case and are on the lookout for Murugan.
title: Woman stabbed to death by brother
